BERGU SKATI
WEBSITE AND
ADVETISEMENT
CAMPAIGN

berguskati.lv

Bergu Skati is a modern and luxurious private village located near Riga. Our client, Land & Home properties, wanted to reflect the huge potential of the freshly built settlement and show all its amazing features with a stylish and informative landing page.

After creating the landing page we engaged in an advertising campaign for the village, which resulted in the sale of almost all plots within 3 months.

Full HD 1920
DESKTOP
1 / 2
Bergu Skati consists of two village projects that differ in layout, lot size and price. Each of the villages has its own landing page to separate the target traffic and be more convenient for the potential buyer.
2 / 2

Advertising Campaign and SMM Styling

Youtube Ads Video
  • Impressions
    300K+
  • Click-through rate
    12k+
  • Campaign period
    90 days
  • Campaign result
    Sold out

Instagram Styling

We worked extensively on social media throughout the advertising campaign. We created a new image of the company on Instagram and caught the right mood to help sell properties.
While working on the project, one thought never left us:

After all, the best is
yet to come!
